entries.meaning: A chamber used for baking or heating.

verbs.description: oven (third-person singular simple present ovens, present participle ovening, simple past and past participle ovened)

entries.meaning: (transitive, colloquial, informal) To cook in an oven
examples: I'm gonna oven the pie for about 30 minutes, mate.
